data.title: Anabat Insight
data.data exploration: browse and view files as spectrograms
data.sound processing features: filter and process files with time expansion, pitch shift, etc.
data.acoustic parameter measurement: calculate pulse and pass acoustic parameters, e.g. max frequency
data.detector features: bat call detection and custom filtering in full-spectrum and zero-crossing recordings
data.classifier features: create decision tree classifiers and support third-party ID algorithms
